title: Dawnbringer Emote
body:
Ive bought the Daybreak Icon with Emote for 100 tokens but i can figure out how to see it in the game? Can someone help me?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: I have a question. so now that the event is over and emotes have been released nobody said that the dawnbringer emote would be permanent now with emotes so I never got it. Will there ever be a way to get that emote again because I'm a riven main that has the ward skin and border for it and I feel like I don't have the complete set anymore.
Ooooo you need to make sure that icon is equipped as your Profile Icon, then you should be able to use that emote by hitting crtl+6 (will only work during the event).
So, will there be anything else for those of us who wasted 100 Tokens on something that was never stated would have a limited lifespan?
It says right in the description: "Daybreak Icon with _**Event**_ Emote".

Yes.

Event Emote.

It does not, however, say Event EXCLUSIVE Emote.

It's like the Christmas or Halloween themed skins. They are suddenly rendered useless after the period has passed.
SO that means after the event the emote can no longer be used?

So I wasted 100 tokens on a reward I can't use after the event?
I wish it would have stated that, so I could have used them on something useful, like key fragments, an orb.

Not sure what you guys are talking about, maybe it wasn't there before, but for me it very clearly says "Daybreak Icon with _**Event**_ Emote". Maybe you're new around here, but this has always been how these works, so assuming that this one is different is kind of your fault. But again, it says it right in the description.
